name: JesusHeals
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, what's in the news?”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
From Jesus Heals News we share the Bible scripture and the promise of the Father and the blessing of the Holy Spirit. The Gospels demonstrate Jesus' power to heal the sick. If you or a loved one is going through a health crisis, read the following. 
I am the Lord that Heals you. Lord is my Shepherd, I shall not want. Our Father who art in Heaven, our prayers are heard from God as we seek him with our hearts. Cleanse us with your Holy Spirit with the power of your Word alive in us.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
